name: Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk View Machine Edition路径遍历漏洞
description: Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk View Machine Edition是美国罗克韦尔（Rockwell Automation）公司的一款多功能人机界面应用程序。Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk View Machine Edition存在路径遍历漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞删除面板操作系统中的任何文件。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://www.rockwellautomation.com/en-us/trust-center/security-advisories/advisory.SD1753.html
patch: Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk View Machine Edition路径遍历漏洞的补丁
